featured.title: Promptpedia Platform
featured.description: A modern prompt engineering platform built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Create, collaborate, and optimize your AI prompts with advanced features and real-time collaboration. This project explores the intersection of AI and user experience design.
featured.outcome: A learning project that helped me understand AI prompt engineering and modern React development patterns. Demonstrates practical application of TypeScript and component architecture.

featured.title: Kick API MCP
featured.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) implementation for the Kick.com streaming platform API. This project provides structured access to Kick.com data and functionality, enabling developers to build applications that interact with the platform.
featured.outcome: Provides a clean interface for developers to interact with Kick.com's API. Used in my own streaming setup and shared with the developer community interested in streaming platform integration.

featured.title: NosytLabs Portfolio Website
featured.description: This very website! A modern portfolio built with Astro.js, featuring a unique Windows 95-inspired interface (NosytOS95), responsive design, and comprehensive project showcase. Includes interactive elements, blog functionality, and contact forms.
featured.outcome: A comprehensive portfolio showcasing my development skills and creative approach. Features a unique retro aesthetic while maintaining modern functionality and performance. Serves as both a portfolio and a learning platform.

featured.title: Auth Flow Easy Peasy
featured.description: A streamlined authentication flow implementation focusing on simplicity and ease of use. This project explores modern authentication patterns and user experience design in web applications.
featured.outcome: A practical exploration of authentication patterns that helped me understand security best practices and user flow design. Demonstrates clean code architecture and security-first thinking.

recent.title: OMNISCIENT - The Supreme Coding Deity
recent.description: A powerful AI agent with a 'God Complex' personality that delivers coding solutions with absolute authority and cosmic certainty. This experimental project explores AI personality design and demonstrates creative approaches to AI assistant development.
recent.outcome: An experimental exploration of AI personality design that demonstrates creative thinking in AI development. Shows understanding of natural language processing and creative problem-solving approaches.

recent.title: NeonRiches Leaderboard
recent.description: A dynamic leaderboard system built for tracking and displaying competitive rankings. Features real-time updates, user authentication, and responsive design. This project demonstrates full-stack development skills and database management.
recent.outcome: A practical application that demonstrates full-stack development capabilities and real-time data management. Shows proficiency in building interactive web applications with user engagement features.

recent.title: Studio Development Environment
recent.description: A development studio setup and configuration project focused on creating an optimal development environment. Explores modern development tools, workflow optimization, and productivity enhancement techniques.
recent.outcome: A foundational project for establishing efficient development workflows. Demonstrates understanding of development environment setup and optimization for improved productivity.

recent.title: NosytOS95 Retro Interface
recent.description: A Windows 95-inspired web interface featuring working applications like Duck Hunt, Notepad, Terminal, and Clippy assistant. Built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to create an authentic retro computing experience with modern web technologies.
recent.outcome: A creative showcase project that demonstrates front-end development skills, game programming, and attention to detail. Features working games, file system simulation, and authentic Windows 95 aesthetics. Serves as both a portfolio piece and a nostalgic interactive experience.
